医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
光照行为可以预测睡眠类型、睡眠质量、情绪、记忆力和注意力吗？研究人员旨在了解光暴露行为评估 (LEBA) 类别对睡眠类型、情绪、睡眠质量、记忆力和注意力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Can-light-exposure-behaviors-predict-chronotype-sleep-quality-mood-memory-and-concentration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Can-light-exposure-behaviors-predict-chronotype-sleep-quality-mood-memory-and-concentration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b26b95b3-f30d-46c2-89ce-f940acd649c6 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 07:56:00 -0400 Can light exposure behaviors predict chronotype, sleep quality, mood, memory, and concentration?
利用代谢组学和转录组学研究曲普坦治疗自发性偏头痛的机制研究人员利用转录组学和代谢组学讨论了曲坦类药物治疗自发性偏头痛发作的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/The-mechanisms-of-triptan-using-metabolomics-and-transcriptomics-in-spontaneous-migraine-attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/The-mechanisms-of-triptan-using-metabolomics-and-transcriptomics-in-spontaneous-migraine-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfc3cf2c-cc1a-459c-9c77-53e3f9df13ba Thu, 03 Aug 2023 07:48:00 -0400 The mechanisms of triptan using metabolomics and transcriptomics in spontaneous migraine attacks

“良心”法案让医疗服务提供者选择不提供广泛的护理蒙大拿州的一项新法律将为拒绝开大麻处方或参与堕胎、医疗协助死亡、性别肯定护理或其他违反其伦理、道德或宗教的程序和治疗的医疗保健从业者提供全面的法律保护信念或原则。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/e28098C​​onsciencee28099-bills-let-medical-providers-opt-out-of-providing-a-wide-range-of-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/e28098C​​onsciencee28099-bills-let-medical-providers-opt-out-of-providing-a-wide-range-of-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0884fa56-109c-44c4-a6ef-28382079f035 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 06:47:22 -0400 ‘Conscience’ bills let medical providers opt out of providing a wide range of care
